alert.note: Alert for Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 6:27AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Gulf, western Wakulla, southern Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties through 700 AM EDT/600 AM CDT/... At 626 AM EDT/526 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Wewahitchka, or 14 miles northeast of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Buck Siding, Morgan Place, Vilas, Central City, Sanborn, Owens Bridge, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Kern, Wilma, Sumatra, Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Nixon Garden, Twin Pole, Dalkeith and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
